meanings.definition: The action or process of making something wider or larger.
meanings.sent1: The dilations of the balloon made it expand quickly.
meanings.sent2: The artist used dilations to enlarge the painting.
meanings.sent3: The dilations of the cake in the oven were unexpected.
meanings.sent4: Her laughter caused a dilation of joy in the room.
meanings.sent5: The dilations of the riverbanks after the rain were visible from afar.

meanings.definition: The result of making something wider or larger.
meanings.sent1: The dilations of the fabric were noticeable after washing.
meanings.sent2: The dilations of the road construction caused traffic delays.
meanings.sent3: The dilations of the balloon made it look like a giant bubble.
meanings.sent4: The dilations of the city skyline at sunset were breathtaking.
meanings.sent5: The dilations of the flower petals under the morning sun were beautiful to see.
